CROPS.title: Crop cover: areas where crop cover is above 30%

GRASSL.title: Grass cover: areas where grass cover is above 30%

SHRUB.title: Shrub cover: areas where shrub cover is above 30%

FISHR.title: Fisheries: areas where total fish biomass is above the 50th percentile

TREES.title: Forest-cover: areas where forest cover is above 30%

MNGROVS.title: Biodiversity: areas where there is a presence of mangroves

LOWAREAS.title: Physical: areas located between 10 meters below and above sea level

BIO.title: Biodiversity: terrestrial and marine protected areas

POP.title: Human: areas where population growth (>100hab/km2) is exacerbating climate change impacts
